data.actual_result: There is a black space which acts like you dragged to see your channels and servers but nothing is there. It is also difficult to drag back, as if it's stuck.
data.expected_result: You should see your text channel fully.
data.short_description: After putting an iPad to sleep and waking it, you have black space on the left side of Discord [ 9.7" or higher iPads with iOS 10 or above only.]
data.steps_to_repro: - Send an message in a server. - Put iPad to sleep. - Wake it up to go back into Discord.
